about_the_game:
Step into the captivating world of Seductive Shadows, an erotic adventure set in a vibrant metropolis. You play as a fresh-faced student entering the prestigious Alfonso University. However, fate has other plans, leading you down a path fraught with occult mysteries intimately tied to your very being.

Here, you'll encounter Sally, an enigmatic succubus offering a pact of protection... for a price - your essence. Immerse yourself in a realm brimming with arcane enigmas, surreal visions, and extraordinary encounters. Forge intense connections with a diverse cast of characters, each harboring their own secrets and intricate storylines.



Embark on a journey of power, desire, and self-discovery in this richly woven erotic fantasy visual novel. Can you maintain the facade of a normal student life while unraveling your newfound powers and eluding the watchful eyes of the Underworld?

Seductive Shadows is in active development, with frequent updates adding new content!



The Seductive Shadows DEMO (Episodes 1 & 2) features:
  • A captivating cast of romanceable characters
  • Over 56,000 words of immersive content
  • 49 CG scenes (both NSFW and SFW) with more than 144 variations to unlock
  • Available in English, Chinese, French, Russian, and Japanese
  • Customizable gameplay paths: straight, bi, or gay routes based on your choices (including trans/futa and same-sex romance options)
  • An original, enchanting soundtrack
  • CG gallery to revisit your favorite moments



THEMES CURRENTLY EXPLORED IN-GAME:
Exhibitionism, compromising situations, school setting, public intimacy, voyeurism, same-sex relationships, interracial encounters, threesomes, self-pleasure, trans characters, sensual touching, erotic teasing, fantasy creatures, mind control...

COMING IN FUTURE UPDATES:
Domination, submission, group scenarios, and much more...

!! Note: This game contains straight/gay/trans content that is avoidable. You can customize your experience to exclude any content you don't wish to see.

Trans characters: Cassie, Althea, Aline

content_descriptors.notes:
The game contains mature sexual themes and explicit depictions of sexual acts, including optional routes with futanari/transgender characters and same-sex relationships. Sexual content is frequent throughout the game.
The story also explores serious topics that some players may be sensitive to, including:

- Depictions of drug addiction and substance abuse

- References to past sexual assault, non-consensual acts, and situations involving dubious consent

- Depictions of self-harm and suicidal thoughts

Players should be aware of the prevalence of mature sexual content and the inclusion of these sensitive themes before purchasing the game, as they are an integral part of the overall narrative and character arcs.
